contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox City Japan |Name= Ishii |JapaneseName= 石井町 |MapImage= Map Ishii,Tokushima en.png |settlement_type=Town |Region= [[Shikoku region|Shikoku]] |Prefecture= [[Tokushima Prefecture|Tokushima]] |District= [[Myōzai District, Tokushima|Myōzai]] |Area_km2= 28.83 |PopDate= 2003 |Population= 26,250 |Density_km2= auto |Coords= |LatitudeDegrees= 34 |LatitudeMinutes= 4 |LatitudeSeconds= |LongtitudeDegrees= 134 |LongtitudeMinutes= 26 |LongtitudeSeconds= |Tree= |Flower= |Bird= |SymbolImage= |SymbolDescription= |Mayor= |CityHallPostalCode= |CityHallAddress= |CityHallPhone= |CityHallLink= [http://www.town.ishii.lg.jp/ Town of Ishii] }} {{nihongo|'''Ishii'''|石井町|Ishii-chō}} is a [[towns of Japan|town]] located in [[Myōzai District, Tokushima|Myōzai District]], [[Tokushima Prefecture|Tokushima]], [[Japan]]. As of 2003, the town has an estimated [[population]] of 26,250 and a [[population density|density]] of 910.51 persons per km². The total area is 28.83 km². ==External links== {{Commons category-inline}} *[http://www.town.ishii.lg.jp/ Ishii official website] {{ja icon}} [[Category:Towns in Tokushima Prefecture]] {{Tokushima-geo-stub}}
